name: The Chipley Murrah House Bed and Breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Donna, the B&B owner, is wonderful! Our room and breakfast was lovely! The house is beautiful, on the inside and outside.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B

likes.liked: — the location and the rooms....beautiful and wonderful, along with Callaway Gardens!

reviews.text: I highly recommend this delightful B&B.
reviews.title: Best B&B in Georgia is Chipley Murrah

reviews.text: We have just returned home after a road trip around the Southern States of USA, our stay at the Chipley Murrah guest house was memorable for the friendly welcome we received from Paul & Donna & the wonderful feeling that we just wanted to stay there for ever.
reviews.title: Our 4th, visit
Southern Hospitality at Its Best!
reviews.text: The accomodation is spotless with fascinating ornaments & spectacular stained glass windows.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was the best place we stayed in during our Southern states vacation. The innkeepers, Donna and Paul, were friendly, helpful, and sweet. The location was pretty, the room was well appointed and the bathroom was larger then my living room. There was a little problem with the air condition but it bothered Donna and Paul more then it did us. She made us iced tea in the afternoon and the breakfast, especially the french toast with pecan syrup, was fantastic.
reviews.title: Loved this place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Judging by the previous glowing reviews, and the photos of this lovely house on their website, our choice was easy! If you have one iota of romantic inclination, this is the place to stay. Walking thru the beautifully furnished rooms, and up and down the staircases (they're just not made like that anymore), you feel like you've really entered an earlier century. Donna and Paul aren't museum curators, just real people with great taste, and a knack for creating the perfect atmosphere for this gem of an old house. They are the perfect hosts, and made us feel completely at home. The rooms are cozy, our bed was so comfortable, the porches are lovely, Donna makes lovely breakfasts and our trip was just perfect, we didn't want to leave!!!
reviews.title: Beautiful house, friendliest hosts, an experience to remember!!

reviews.text: Our church booked the whole B&B for a Couple Retreat. Paul and Donna were superb hosts. We felt right at home. They were accommodating even with the group. Food was excellent. We will definately be back on a solo trip.
reviews.title: Fantasic Place for a Couple retreat

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Donna and Paul were the best host anyone could ask for. The soft bed, d-caf coffee and deep claw foot tub felt so great after a day in Callaway Gardens. The house looked beautiful from the street and just got better as we went inside. I would definitely recommend to anyone (except small children--too many antiques)
reviews.title: Great stay, great host, great breakfast---Just GREAT!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The fact that we keep returning must tell you how much we love this b & b. The house is beautiful, rooms and beds superb,breakfast first class and Donna and Paul wonderfull innkeepers. The position is also great both for Atlanta airport and travelling into north florida.
reviews.title: 6th visit, we must love it.
